TextView.android:text: 5 Pull Ups (g) ---> 5 Push Ups
x5 Sets (2 to 3 min rest inbetween sets)
30-40 seconds DeadHang Hold
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
15 Sit Ups ---> 15 Roman Twists ---> 45 seconds Plank
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
5 Bar Knee Raises (Hold for 15 seconds on last rep)
x3 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Squats ---> 10 Lunges (E/S) ---> 10 Jumping Squats (E/S)
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
10 Jumping Lunges (E/S) ---> 1 min Plank
x5 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
15 Side Squats (E/S) ---> 1 min Side Plank (E/S)
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
5-7 Chin Ups (g) + 10.10.10. Isometric Hold
x5 Sets (3 min rest inbetween sets)
5 Push Ups ---> 7 Wide Push Ups ---> 30 seconds DeadHang Hold
x5 Sets (2 mins rest inbetween sets)
10 Floor Leg Raises ---> 90 seconds Plank
x5 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20 Squats ---> 1 min Wall Sit
x3 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
15 Lunges (E/S) ---> 5 Jumping Lunges (E/S)
x4 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
20 Jumping Squats
x3 Sets (60 seconds rest inbetween sets)
30 Sit Ups ---> 1 min Side Plank (E/S)
x4 Sets (90 seconds rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
Optional: Max Chin Ups (g) (x3-4 Sets, 2 mins rest inbetween sets)
Stretching, Mobility, Foam Rolling and Rest.
End of Beginner Program Level 1 - Week 1
RATE YOUR PERFORMANCE

Progress onto Week 2 if you're satisfied with your performance during this week's routine. If majority of the sets were broken, then it's highly recommended and encouraged to repeat Week 1 before moving forward.
